title: Geometric Diamond Pendant - "Vajrala Padakam"
materials: 18K Rose Gold with Round Brilliant Cut Diamonds (SI Clarity
G-H Color). Hyderabadi Polish for lasting luster.
features: Modern geometric design featuring a layered hexagonal structure. The inner circle showcases a cluster setting of diamonds for maximum brilliance. The openwork design allows light to pass through, enhancing the sparkle. A versatile piece blending contemporary style with subtle elegance.
occasions: and festive occasions. A modern update to traditional temple jewelry; can also be worn for informal gatherings.
description: Crafted in Hyderabad with meticulous attention to detail. The unique geometric design makes it a conversation starter. Rose gold offers a warm and flattering tone for all skin types. The high-quality diamonds ensure lasting sparkle and value.
